edu.cmu.ri.rcommerce.filter
Class PedestrianLocalization_Gyro

java.lang.Object
  edu.cmu.ri.rcommerce.filter.PedestrianLocalization_Gyro
All Implemented Interfaces:
AccelerometerListener, GyroListener, MagnetometerListener, PedestrianLocalization
public class PedestrianLocalization_Gyro
extends Object
implements PedestrianLocalization

Localizes pedestrians using an OrientationFilter for heading determination and the standard deviation method for detecting movement.
